name: BlowFish Encryptor - Secure File Encryption Platform
desc: Developed a secure web platform for encrypting and decrypting text, image, audio, and video files using the Blowfish algorithm. Implemented client-side encryption to encrypt files before upload to AWS S3, ensuring zero-data visibility in cloud storage. Integrated MySQL-based session with automated email delivery of encryption keys and secured data transmission using SSL to prevent MITM attacks.

name: AgriRent - Equipment Rental Platform
desc: Built a full-stack agriculture equipment rental platform enabling farmers to rent machinery from verified vendors nearby. Implemented multi-role access control for Admin, Vendor, and Customer using JWT-based authentication and RBAC. Developed a real-time booking system with availability tracking, conflict prevention, and user-driven equipment ratings.

name: Image Forgery Detection using CNNs
desc: Developed a CNN-based system using Error Level Analysis (ELA) to detect tampered images. Trained a VGG16 model on the CASIA2 dataset achieving 88% validation accuracy. Evaluated model performance using Precision, Recall, F1 score, and ROC-AUC metrics. Technologies: Python, OpenCV, VGG16

name: Data Structures & Algorithms Practice
desc: Solved 400+ Data Structures and Algorithms problems on LeetCode using C and C++. Strong foundation in problem-solving, optimization, and algorithmic thinking.
